presentationColumns.name: Amount by Price List Distributed
presentationColumns.description:
"line_ordered_quantity" * "price_list_dist" 
 (Calculated price per line when a Boundle transactions sale was done.
source logic in :xxar_autoinvoice_pkg.get_price_list_dist)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SSYS.Fact - Sale Order line.Amount by Price List Distributed

presentationColumns.name: Ordered Quantity (positive)
presentationColumns.description: The Ordered Quantity always in positive value (even for RETURN type of lines)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SSYS.Fact - Sale Order line.Ordered Quantity (positive)

presentationColumns.name: Rate By First Invoice Date
presentationColumns.description:
If Invoice exists for the Sale Order Line, use rate by "First Invoice Date" 
Else, empty.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SSYS.Fact - Sale Order line.Rate By First Invoice Date

presentationColumns.name: Calc Rate To USD
presentationColumns.description:
If Invoice exists for the Sale Order Line, use rate by "First Invoice Date" 
Else use Today's Rate.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SSYS.Fact - Sale Order line.Calc Rate To USD

presentationColumns.name: Line Dist Functional Amount
presentationColumns.description:
Calculate Qty:
CASE WHEN  "SSYS"."Dim - Item"."User Item Type" in ('FRT','XXOBJ_PP') THEN  "SSYS"."Fact - Sale Order line"."Unit Selling Price"  
WHEN  (SIGN ("SSYS"."Dim - Sale Order Line"."Ordered Quantity") =-1) OR (SIGN ("SSYS"."Dim - Sale Order Line"."Unit Selling Price") =-1) OR ("SSYS"."Dim - Sale Order Header"."Average Discount (Varchar)"  IS NULL) OR ("SSYS"."Dim - Sale Order Header"."Average Discount (Varchar)"  ='Total list price amount equal 0') THEN "SSYS"."Fact - Sale Order line"."Unit Selling Price"   *   "SSYS"."Fact - Sale Order line"."Ordered Quantity" 
ELSE "SSYS"."Dim - Sale Order Line"."Price List Dist" * "SSYS"."Dim - Sale Order Header"."Average Discount Multiplier" *   "SSYS"."Fact - Sale Order line"."Ordered Quantity" 
END
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SSYS.Fact - Sale Order line.Line Dist Functional Amount

presentationColumns.name: Line Dist Functional Amount (USD)
presentationColumns.description:
Calculate Qty:
"Calc Rate To USD"  * "Line Dist Functional Amount"
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SSYS.Fact - Sale Order line.Line Dist Functional Amount (USD)
